laboratory_examinations.findings: Hematocrit 28.4%, Hemoglobin 9.1 g/dl, White-cell count 8300 per mm3, Neutrophils 77%, Lymphocytes 14%, Monocytes 6%, Eosinophils 3%

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Hematocrit decreased from 27.8% to 27.4% from the previous test on 16 days before admission.
Sodium increased from 127 mmol/liter to 134 mmol/liter 16 days before admission, and then to 131 mmol/liter on admission.
Creatinine decreased from 3.52 mg/dl to 2.25 mg/dl 16 days before admission, then increased to 3.43 mg/dl on admission.
Glucose increased from 104 mg/dl to 143 mg/dl 16 days before admission, then decreased to 103 mg/dl on admission.
